entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is described as an enormous hippogriﬀ that rose into the air with its wings.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a person who jumped back and gazed after Buckbeak as it took oﬀ into the air.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as a person who jumped back with Harry as Buckbeak rose into the air.

relationships.description: Harry observed Buckbeak as it took oﬀ into the air with its wings.
